data.description: U.S. STOCKS EXTEND FALL, NASDAQ DOWN 1.00%

$NVDA - NVIDIA ‘GETS NO RESPECT’ DESPITE BLOWOUT PERFORMANCE: CANTOR Cantor Fitzgerald says NVIDIA remains a top pick, arguing the stock is undervalued despite exceptional results. Analyst C.J. Muse highlighted massive revenue beats, strong forward growth, and surging AI

data.title: Empower Brands hosts successful Ignite Conference with 1,100 attendees and 85 vendors, marking largest annual meeting to date.
data.description: A franchisor of various brands hosted its annual meeting in Richmond, Virginia, on February 26, 2026, attracting over 1,100 participants and partnering with 85 vendors. The event aimed to align strategies and commemorate systemwide achievements in the home and business services sectors.

data.title: BofA invests $40M in American workforce skills by 2025, resulting in 86,400 placed in jobs & 265K upskilled.
data.description: A report revealed that through strategic partnerships, over 86,400 individuals secured employment opportunities while a staggering 265,000 people received training to enhance their skills. Bank of America disclosed an investment of close to $40 million in 2025 to support workforce development initiatives. This announcement was made on February 26, 2026, in Charlotte, North Carolina, as part of the observance of Career and Technical Education Month.

data.title: Warehouses paying high cost for lack of agility, says Lucas Systems study. WEXFORD, Pa - Feb. 26, 2026.
data.description: A recent market study conducted by Lucas Systems revealed that warehouses without the agility needed to address unexpected disruptions are facing significant financial consequences. Released on Feb. 26, 2026, in WEXFORD, Pa., the study highlights the high cost of inaction for these facilities. The study emphasized the importance of operational flexibility for warehouses as they navigate unforeseen challenges in their operations.

data.title: Ithina creates global AI platform for physical commerce, surpasses 50M connected endpoints. Major investors include Kline Hill Partners, Probot Ventures, and Zebra Technologies Corporation. Launches vast AI-enabled execution network.
data.description: Ithina Holdings Inc. has recently introduced a groundbreaking AI-enabled execution network for the physical economy. With support from Kline Hill Partners, Probot Ventures, and Zebra Technologies Corporation, this initiative is set to become one of the largest of its kind globally. The launch took place in Dallas on Feb. 26, 2026. Ithina, the AI-driven intelligence platform created by Ithina Holdings Inc., will aim to revolutionize operations in various industries. This promising venture has attracted significant attention and investment, with backing from leading entities in the field.

data.title: JEDEC updates UFS standards with JESD220H and JESD223G, designed for mobile, automotive, and computing systems, offering faster data access and better performance.
data.description: The JEDEC Solid State Technology Association based in Arlington, Virginia has released two crucial standards for the microelectronics industry. The newly published JESD220H and JESD223G focus on Universal Flash Storage 5.0 and UFS Host Controller Interface 5.0. These standards are aimed at mobile devices, automotive systems, and computers that require high performance while maintaining low power consumption. UFS 5.0 is expected to provide quicker data access and enhanced performance.

data.title: Huper secures $1.5M funding for AI Chief of Staff to support leaders with improved organization management.
data.description: Atlanta-based Huper Corporation has recently secured $1.5 million in pre-seed funding from investors Nadia Partners, Link Ventures, and Jim Brown of Long Ridge Equity Partners. The funding will support the development of an innovative AI Chief of Staff aimed at enhancing organizational leadership. Unlike traditional tools like dashboards and chatbots, Huper's security-centric platform aims to empower leaders with enhanced clarity, accountability, and trust. The AI system operates as an always-on tool that securely collates and analyzes data from various sources such as emails, messaging platforms, and CRM tools.

data.title: ISG introduces first standardized contract framework for revenue cycle management in U.S. healthcare organizations.
data.description: A new standardized contracting framework has been launched by ISG for U.S. healthcare organizations that work with revenue cycle management providers in Stamford, Connecticut. This initiative marks the first of its kind in the industry and aims to streamline the contracting process. This development is significant as it will help define clearer terms and agreements between healthcare organizations and revenue cycle management providers. By introducing this framework, ISG is paving the way for more efficient and transparent partnerships in the healthcare sector.

data.title: TeamDynamix experiences 50% increase in large enterprise customer wins thanks to no-code ITSM adoption, AI, and automation.
data.description: In Columbus, Ohio, TeamDynamix is experiencing significant growth due to the increasing adoption of no-code IT Service Management (ITSM). The company has seen a 50% rise in acquiring large enterprise customers. The main factors driving this growth are the implementation of artificial intelligence (AI) and automation within their services.

data.title: Backroads offers 2027 trip dates for private groups at 2026 prices until April 15 with thousands of options.
data.description: As of February 26, 2026, Backroads, a prominent active travel company based in Berkeley, California, revealed that reservations for their 2027 Private Trips made before April 15, 2026, will be locked in at 2026 pricing. This offer encompasses thousands of Private Trip dates for the upcoming year, allowing private groups to select from a wide range of options. This initiative presents a significant opportunity for cost savings as clients can secure these reservations at the current year's rates for the following year's adventures.

data.title: Noble 33 and Toca Madera team up for Houston Rodeo. Noble Noir offers private suite at NRG Stadium. Disco horse installation.
data.description: In Houston, on February 26, 2026, the Noble Noir Membership from a renowned brand is launching a private suite at NRG Stadium. This suite offers exclusive access to members. Toca Madera Houston, an acclaimed Mexican steakhouse, is preparing for three weeks of Rodeo Houston celebrations.

data.title: Ademi LLP probes Tennant Company for securities fraud, citing inaccuracies in financial statements and business operations.
data.description: In Milwaukee on February 26, 2026, Ademi LLP announced that they are conducting an investigation into potential securities fraud claims against Tennant (NYSE: TNC). The probe stems from allegations that Tennant may have provided misleading information concerning its financial statements, business activities, and future outlook. Investors are encouraged to delve further into the matter for potential recourse.

data.title: Wilentz, Goldman & Spitzer, P.A. renews lease for its New Jersey headquarters, committing through at least 2042.
data.description: In Woodbridge, New Jersey, on February 26, 2026, Wilentz, Goldman & Spitzer, P.A. disclosed their lease renewal for their New Jersey headquarters located at the David T. Wilentz building until 2042. The extension underscores the firm's longstanding presence in the area and their commitment to the location for at least another 16 years.

data.title: Revenue Analytics launches enhanced Climber RMS for hotels, aiming to automate pricing decisions and scale revenue performance at every stage of maturity.
data.description: Atlanta and Lisbon, Portugal - Revenue Analytics, a prominent company specializing in AI-driven revenue and margin optimization, recently unveiled an upgraded version of Climber RMS. The enhanced platform is tailored to assist hotels of varying revenue maturity levels in automating pricing decisions, enhancing strategic operations, and improving revenue performance without increasing operational intricacies. The new Climber RMS platform features three distinct stages - Smart Pricing, Growth, and Pro - to cater to hotels looking to streamline their pricing strategies and boost revenue generation.
